item.title: Google introduces the Chromebook
item.description: Finally the Chromebook is official. After many rumors and speculations about Google's Chromebook the search giant today announced the first Chromebook.

item.title: KDE 4.4 Introduces Netbook Interface
item.description: Yesterday the availability of KDE Software Compilation 4.4, Caikaku, was announced. This new release comes with several new features including a netbook interface.

item.title: Beginner Intro to Ubuntu Netbook Remix
item.description: If you are new to Ubuntu Netbook Remix this video will give you a basic overview and a few customization tips to get started with version 9.10 of this popular

item.title: Jolicloud Pre-Beta on the Samsung N140
item.description: After months of private alpha testing Tariq Krim, founder and CEO of Jolicloud, announced the launch of the publicly available pre-beta of the Linux based

item.title: xPUD 0.9.2 Quick Video Tour
item.description: xPUD is to Firefox what Chrome OS is to Chrome. It is a trimmed-down Linux distribution for netbooks that mainly consists of a Web browser and a media player.

item.title: Ubuntu Netbook Remix 9.10 on a Lenovo S10
item.description: In this video Marina from Marina's Bloggariffic reviews Ubuntu Netbook Remix Karmic Koala on her Lenovo Ideapad S10 netbook.

item.title: Introducing the litl webbook and OS
item.description: Doug Aamoth of CrunchGear and litl CEO John Chuang recorded this video walkthrough of the litl webbook and OS talking about the design philosophy behind this

item.title: Moblin v2.1 on a Toshiba NB205 Netbook
item.description: 2 days ago we saw the release of Moblin v2.1 which comes with several new features and user requested improvements, such as enhanced browser functionality.

item.title: A Quick Look at Moblin under Mandriva 2010
item.description: Yesterday Mandriva Linux 2010 was released. The latest version, code named Adelie, introduces a new technology called Smart desktop that is task oriented and

item.title: Jolicloud Intro on an ASUS Eee PC 1005HA
